mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BPM_AGENT_SETTING( ID, AUTH_ID, AUTH_NAME, CREATE_TIME, START_DATE, END_DATE, ENABLED, AUTH_TYPE, AGENT_ID, AGENT, FLOW_KEY, FLOW_NAME ) values( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{authType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BPM_AGENT_SETTING SET AUTH_ID=#{authId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_NAME=#{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, START_DATE=#{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, END_DATE=#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ENABLED=#{enabled,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AUTH_TYPE=#{authType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AGENT_ID=#{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT=#{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOW_KEY=#{flowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOW_NAME=#{flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID=#{id}
